title: Principle of Management & Organization
author: Dr. Pedrito R. Pereda & Dr. Purisima P. Pereda
description: This book provides a comprehensive guide on management theories, organizational structures, and leadership strategies crucial for technical and livelihood educators.

title: Learning and Living in the 21st Century: Worktext in Technology and Livelihood Education 8
author: Leonora D. Basbas, Belen M. Jamisal, Ma. Luz R. Lebrudo
description: This worktext provides comprehensive coverage of technology and livelihood education topics, focusing on practical applications and skills essential for 21st-century learners.
